reviews.review_msg: Did not like him.  Had to teach the material to myself.  Did not like his exams compared to the other prof (He only taught the second half of the class).
(2nd half); didn't learn anything from MC exams
He had to deal with a ton of disrespect from the class I was in. Kudos to him for keeping calm. I found his teaching effective.

This prof sucks. u can't find anyone who is worse than him, seriously. This guy doesnt know how to teach, doesnt know how to write, doesnt know how to talk. It's better to stay home and read the textbook than go to his lectures and listen to his bullsht

If you don't read the textbook before going to class, you better not go. He makes the lecture material more confusing and hard to understand. His notes are not too useful. The MT was fair. Now I just read the textbook myself to learn, and borrowed my friend's notes. I don't like going to his lectures anymore.
this man.. is the most unorganized teacher ive ever had.. his notes.. are worthless... he cant lecture at all.. overall he's not a good professor in any kind of way.

He seems to know his stuff inside and out, but he's a TERRIBLE lecturer! Doesn't know how to keep students awake and interested. But then again, it's kind of hard to top Holdcroft off... (the prof for the first half of the course)
Not the greatest teacher, He is  mono tone. Everyone in class is confused during his lectures.

Loves the sound of his own voice.   Lectures are long boring monologues.  Can't manage to explain topics at a level which ordinary human beings can comprehend.  I think I actually know less after lectures than before.  Avoid if at all possible.
I dunno hes too fast for me. Its not clear.

Nice prof, but the materials are too hard to understand, so I am not sure it is his problem or the course materials are too hard. He is willing to help you to clear every single problem on hw and test.

His notes in class are awful, but when I went to his office for help, he was extremely helpful. He was happy to take the time to explain concepts to me several times until I understood it. Often says important things in lecture and doesn't write it down.
Hypnotic monotone.  Will put you to sleep after 5 pots of coffee
He can't teach.  Makes mistakes on his own notes and he can't even copy it correctly out of the book.  He is also color blind
This prof sucks! His notes are just awful.
No Comments
this guy is just awful
Even though there are some interesting demonstrations during lecture, the lectures are generally boring and uninformative. One really must teach themselves the course, or risk failing.
his notes are all in power point and he skips through the notes very quickly...sometimes hard to follow and confusing
Worse prof ever, very unclear, hard exams, and boring
BOARING!!!!! You will fall asleep in 2 sec and he hates students. He is also NEVER there for help. Very bad Prof!!!!!

I don't think I've ever fallen asleep so many times in a course before.  He needs to liven up his lectures before anyone will pay attention, since most of the class is filled with chatting students anyway.
Hill's lectures are confusing and useless. The tests and CAPAs don't correspond.
lectures kinda boring, reading textbook might be easier
No Comments
No Comments
He's funny at first....but you will get BORE afterwards~ with all his so called   CONCRETE   lectures....
midterms more challenging than average.  lectures generally useless - speaks too quickly for ppl to follow.... power point notes are useless...never gets lecture notes or marks up in time...
Boring lectures, useless notes, poor attitude.
puts everyone to sleep 5 minutes in to his lectures, can survive quite well in the course w/o attending his lectures.  stares down at students....
No Comments
No Comments
Poor at giving explainations and very boring speaker. However, good experiments
No Comments
enthusiastic and very helpful..
No Comments
Funny prof, and good demos
Prof. Hill has really cool demostrations.
No Comments
monotone voice, rep. hand movement, staring down students, bad at explaining
Awesome prof. 4 students who think he's hard, try reading the text and doing HW!
No Comments
Boring, but wasn't TOO tough, 'cuz half the exam Q's were omitted (exaggeration)
Very good prof. Fair exams. Would take more classes with him in future.
Very dry lectures, hard to stay awake.  Exams were hard too.  Unfair questions.
No Comments
No Comments
super boring lectures, unclear in explanations, hard exams
